com.application.components.dtdParser

Class DTDSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.application.components.dtdParser.DTDSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DTDSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that serializes a DTD.

    Note that this class does not write out parameter entities.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ronald Bourret, Miguel Urízar Salinas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
